IP.Name: FDCAN
IP.About: FDCAN: Flexible Data-Rate Controller Area Network

RefParameter.Name: FrameFormat
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the FDCAN frame format.

RefParameter.Name: Mode
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the FDCAN operating mode.

RefParameter.Name: AutoRetransmission
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable the automatic retransmission mode.

RefParameter.Name: ClockDivider
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the FDCAN kernel clock divider when the clock calibration is bypassed.

RefParameter.Name: TxDelayCompensation
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable the transmitter delay compensation.

RefParameter.Name: NominalPrescaler
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the value by which the oscillator frequency is divided for generating the nominal bit time quanta.

RefParameter.Name: NominalSyncJumpWidth
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the maximum number of time quanta the FDCAN hardware is allowed to lengthen or shorten a bit to perform resynchronization.

RefParameter.Name: NominalTimeSeg1
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of time quanta in Bit Segment 1.

RefParameter.Name: NominalTimeSeg2
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of time quanta in Bit Segment 2.

RefParameter.Name: DataPrescaler
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the value by which the oscillator frequency is divided for generating the data bit time quanta.

RefParameter.Name: DataSyncJumpWidth
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the maximum number of time quanta the FDCAN hardware is allowed to lengthen or shorten a data bit to perform resynchronization.

RefParameter.Name: DataTimeSeg1
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of time quanta in Data Bit Segment 1.

RefParameter.Name: DataTimeSeg2
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of time quanta in Data Bit Segment 2.

RefParameter.Name: StdFiltersNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of standard Message ID filter.

RefParameter.Name: ExtFiltersNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of extended Message ID filters.

RefParameter.Name: RxFifo0ElmtsNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of Rx FIFO0 Elements.

RefParameter.Name: RxFifo0ElmtSize
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Data Field Size in an Rx FIFO0 element.

RefParameter.Name: RxFifo1ElmtsNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of Rx FIFO 1 Elements.

RefParameter.Name: RxFifo1ElmtSize
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Rx FIFO 1 Data Field Size.

RefParameter.Name: RxBuffersNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of Dedicated Rx Buffer elements.

RefParameter.Name: RxBufferSize
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Rx Buffer Data Field Size.

RefParameter.Name: TxEventsNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of Tx Event FIFO elements.

RefParameter.Name: TxBuffersNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of Dedicated Tx Buffers.

RefParameter.Name: TxFifoQueueElmtsNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of Tx Buffers used for Tx FIFO/Queue.

RefParameter.Name: TxFifoQueueMode
RefParameter.Description: Tx FIFO/Queue Mode selection.

RefParameter.Name: TxElmtSize
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Tx Element Data Field Size.

RefParameter.Name: StandardFilterSA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Filter List Standard Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: ExtendedFilterSA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Filter List Extended Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: RxFIFO0SA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Rx FIFO 0 Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: RxFIFO1SA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Rx FIFO 1 Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: RxBufferSA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Rx Buffer Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFIFOSA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Event FIFO Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: TxBufferSA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Tx Buffers Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: TxFIFOQSA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Tx FIFO/Queue Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: ErrorCode
RefParameter.Description: FDCAN Error code

RefParameter.Name: Filter_IdType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the identifier type.

RefParameter.Name: Filter_FilterIndex
RefParameter.Description: 0 and 63, if IdType is FDCAN_EXTENDED_ID

RefParameter.Name: FilterType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the filter type.

PossibleValue.Comment: Range filter from FilterID1 to FilterID2
Dual ID filter for FilterID1 or FilterID2
Classic filter: FilterID1 = filter, FilterID2 = mask
Range filter from FilterID1 to FilterID2, EIDM mask not applied

RefParameter.Name: FilterConfig
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the filter configuration.

PossibleValue.Comment: Store in Rx FIFO 0 if filter matches
Store in Rx FIFO 1 if filter matches
Set high priority if filter matches
Set high priority and store in FIFO 0 if filter matches
Set high priority and store in FIFO 1 if filter matches
Store into Rx Buffer, configuration of FilterMode ignored

RefParameter.Name: FilterID1
RefParameter.Description: 0 and 0x1FFFFFFF, if IdType is FDCAN_EXTENDED_ID

RefParameter.Name: FilterID2
RefParameter.Description: 0 and 0x1FFFFFFF, if IdType is FDCAN_EXTENDED_ID This parameter is ignored if FilterConfig is set to FDCAN_FILTER_TO_RXBUFFER

RefParameter.Name: RxBufferIndex
RefParameter.Description: Contains the index of the Rx buffer in which the matching message will be stored.

RefParameter.Name: TxHeader_Identifier
RefParameter.Description: 0 and 0x1FFFFFFF, if IdType is FDCAN_EXTENDED_ID

RefParameter.Name: TxHeader_IdType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the identifier type for the message that will be transmitted.

RefParameter.Name: TxFrameType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the frame type of the message that will be transmitted.

RefParameter.Name: TxHeader_DataLength
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the length of the frame that will be transmitted.

RefParameter.Name: TxHeader_ErrorStateIndicator
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the error state indicator.

RefParameter.Name: TxHeader_BitRateSwitch
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the Tx frame will be transmitted with or without bit rate switching.

PossibleValue.Comment: FDCAN frames transmitted/received without bit rate switching
FDCAN frames transmitted/received with bit rate switching

RefParameter.Name: TxHeader_FDFormat
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the Tx frame will be transmitted in classic or FD format.

PossibleValue.Comment: Frame transmitted/received in Classic CAN format

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFIFO
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the event FIFO control.

RefParameter.Name: MessageMarker
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the message marker to be copied into Tx Event FIFO element for identification of Tx message status.

RefParameter.Name: TxLocation
RefParameter.Description: Contains the location of the element to be transmitted.

RefParameter.Name: RxHeader_Identifier
RefParameter.Description: 0 and 0x1FFFFFFF, if IdType is FDCAN_EXTENDED_ID

RefParameter.Name: RxHeader_IdType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the identifier type of the received message.

RefParameter.Name: RxFrameType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the the received message frame type.

RefParameter.Name: RxHeader_DataLength
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the received frame length.

RefParameter.Name: RxHeader_ErrorStateIndicator
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the error state indicator.

RefParameter.Name: RxHeader_BitRateSwitch
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the Rx frame is received with or without bit rate switching.

PossibleValue.Comment: FDCAN frames transmitted/received without bit rate switching
FDCAN frames transmitted/received with bit rate switching

RefParameter.Name: RxHeader_FDFormat
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the Rx frame is received in classic or FD format.

PossibleValue.Comment: Frame transmitted/received in Classic CAN format

RefParameter.Name: RxTimestamp
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the timestamp counter value captured on start of frame reception.

RefParameter.Name: RxHeader_FilterIndex
RefParameter.Description: 0 and 64, if IdType is FDCAN_EXTENDED_ID

RefParameter.Name: NonMatchingFrame
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the accepted frame did not match any Rx filter.

PossibleValue.Comment: Received frame matched an Rx filter element
Received frame did not match any Rx filter element

RefParameter.Name: MessageRAMOffset
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the message RAM start address.

RefParameter.Name: OperationMode
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the FDCAN Operation Mode.

RefParameter.Name: TimeMaster
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the instance is a slave or a potential master.

RefParameter.Name: SyncDevLimit
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Synchronization Deviation Limit SDL of the TUR numerator : TUR = (Numerator ± SDL) / Denominator.

RefParameter.Name: InitRefTrigOffset
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Initial Reference Trigger Offset.

RefParameter.Name: ExternalClkSync
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable External Clock Synchronization.

PossibleValue.Comment: External clock synchronization in Level 0,2 disabled
External clock synchronization in Level 0,2 enabled

RefParameter.Name: AppWdgLimit
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Application Watchdog Limit : maximum time after which the application has to serve the application watchdog.

RefParameter.Name: GlobalTimeFilter
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable Global Time Filtering.

PossibleValue.Comment: Global time filtering in Level 0,2 disabled
Global time filtering in Level 0,2 enabled

RefParameter.Name: TTConfig_ClockCalibration
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable Automatic Clock Calibration.

PossibleValue.Comment: Automatic clock calibration in Level 0,2 disabled
Automatic clock calibration in Level 0,2 enabled

RefParameter.Name: EvtTrigPolarity
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Event Trigger Polarity.

RefParameter.Name: TxEnableWindow
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the length of Tx enable window in NTUs.

RefParameter.Name: ExpTxTrigNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of expected Tx_Triggers in the system matrix.

RefParameter.Name: TURNumerator
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the TUR (Time Unit Ratio) numerator.

RefParameter.Name: TURDenominator
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the TUR (Time Unit Ratio) denominator.

RefParameter.Name: TriggerMemoryNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of trigger memory elements.

RefParameter.Name: StopWatchTrigSel
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the input to be used as stop watch trigger.

PossibleValue.Comment: fdcan1_swt0 selected as stop watch trigger
fdcan1_swt1 selected as stop watch trigger
fdcan1_swt2 selected as stop watch trigger
fdcan1_swt3 selected as stop watch trigger

RefParameter.Name: EventTrigSel
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the input to be used as event trigger.

RefParameter.Name: TTMemorySA
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the Trigger Memory Start Address.

RefParameter.Name: ClkCalUnit_ClockCalibration
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable the clock calibration.

RefParameter.Name: MinOscClkPeriods
RefParameter.Description: Configures the minimum number of periods in two CAN bit times.

RefParameter.Name: CalFieldLength
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the calibration field length.

RefParameter.Name: TimeQuantaPerBitTime
RefParameter.Description: Configures the number of time quanta per bit time.

RefParameter.Name: WatchdogStartValue
RefParameter.Description: Start value of the Calibration Watchdog Counter.

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFifo_Identifier
RefParameter.Description: 0 and 0x1FFFFFFF, if IdType is FDCAN_EXTENDED_ID

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFifo_IdType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the identifier type for the message that will be transmitted.

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFifo_TxFrameType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the frame type of the message that will be transmitted.

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFifo_DataLength
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the length of the frame that will be transmitted.

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFifo_ErrorStateIndicator
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the error state indicator.

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFifo_BitRateSwitch
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the Tx frame will be transmitted with or without bit rate switching.

PossibleValue.Comment: FDCAN frames transmitted/received without bit rate switching
FDCAN frames transmitted/received with bit rate switching

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFifo_FDFormat
RefParameter.Description: Specifies whether the Tx frame will be transmitted in classic or FD format.

PossibleValue.Comment: Frame transmitted/received in Classic CAN format

RefParameter.Name: TxTimestamp
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the timestamp counter value captured on start of frame transmission.

RefParameter.Name: TxEventFifo_MessageMarker
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the message marker to be copied into Tx Event FIFO element for identification of Tx message status.

RefParameter.Name: EventType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the event type.

RefParameter.Name: TriggerIndex
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the trigger which will be configured.

RefParameter.Name: TimeMark
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the cycle time for which the trigger becomes active.

RefParameter.Name: Trigger_RepeatFactor
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the trigger repeat factor.

RefParameter.Name: Trigger_StartCycle
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the index of the first cycle in which the trigger becomes active.

RefParameter.Name: TmEventInt
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable the internal time mark event.

PossibleValue.Comment: Internal event is generated when trigger becomes active

RefParameter.Name: TmEventExt
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable the external time mark event.

PossibleValue.Comment: External event (pulse) is generated when trigger becomes active

RefParameter.Name: TriggerType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the trigger type.

PossibleValue.Comment: Transmit reference message in strictly time-triggered operation
Transmit reference message in external event-synchronized time-triggered operation
Start a single transmission in an exclusive time window
Start a continuous transmission in an exclusive time window
Start a transmission in an arbitration time window
Check for missing reference messages in strictly time-triggered operation
Check for missing reference messages in external event-synchronized time-triggered operation
Check for the reception of periodic messages in exclusive time windows
Generate internal/external events depending on TmEventInt/TmEventExt configuration
Illegal trigger, to be assigned to the unused triggers after a FDCAN_TT_WATCH_TRIGGER(_GAP)

RefParameter.Name: Trigger_FilterType
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the filter identifier type.

RefParameter.Name: TxBufferIndex
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the index of the Tx buffer for which the trigger is valid.

RefParameter.Name: Trigger_FilterIndex
RefParameter.Description: 0 and 63, if FilterType is FDCAN_EXTENDED_ID This parameter is taken in consideration only if the trigger is configured for reception.

RefParameter.Name: TransmitPause
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable the Transmit Pause feature.

RefParameter.Name: ProtocolException
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable the Protocol Exception Handling.

RefParameter.Name: EndAddress
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the End Address of the allocated RAM.

RefParameter.Name: ClockCalibration
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable the ClockCalibration.

RefParameter.Name: GapEnable
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the FDCAN TT Operation.

RefParameter.Name: BasicCyclesNbr
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the nubmer of basic cycles in the system matrix.

RefParameter.Name: CycleStartSync
RefParameter.Description: Enable or disable synchronization pulse output at pin fdcan1_soc.

PossibleValue.Comment: Sync pulse at start of basic cycle
Sync pulse at start of matrix
